overview:
1. WHO WE ARE JB Business Consulting is an experienced strategy-management-consultancy in the field of corporate development with an emphasis on business development and mergers and acquisitions. More than 100 (successful) M&A projects over the last 20 years mean that we are the ideal consultancy to find strategic expansions for your company, targeting, for example, technologies, markets, regions, human and machinery capacities, product development, winning major customers or brands or vice versa, optimising the sale of your company and finding strategic or financial partners. Further details can be found on our homepage: www.jb-business.com

  2. WHAT WE DO Our consultants advise companies on subjects such as the strategic development of business segments, the sale of companies, corporation spin-offs, corporate succession in medium-sized companies, and restructuring themes, our constant aim is to generate profitable and sustainable growth for our clients.

We specialise in the following: • Strategic planning/implementation • Business development • Customer-relationship management • Professional planning for taking over and selling companies • Target and investor screening • Restructuring and financial advice • M&A Post merger integration • Change management

Our services range from analysis and strategic development to implementation management. We see ourselves as a connecting element between corporate strategy and its translation into concrete programmes and measures. Our focus lies in branches with international dynamics of change. ,

  1. HOW WE WORK We combine the scientific intelligence of a strategy consultancy with professional M&A and investor-research and the hands on mentality of our consultants. We combine the scientific intelligence of a strategy consultancy with professional M&A and investor-research and the hands on mentality of our consultants. Through rigorous research for relevant information from external and internal data sources our research department is able to ensure an optimised target and investor screening for our mandate’s use. We use several approaches, from the heavily methodologically influenced analysis to workshop based strategies using our various tools.
